title: An excellent dinner in a nice setting
text: The four of us had a great time at this restaurant. It’s located close the busy Bahnhofstrasse but yet at the end of a tranquil side street. The atmosphere was nice, the service attentive and the food very delicious. I had a the beef fillet & wok vegetables which were both cooked to perfection. It could not have been any better! The other dishes my family members had ( Fettuccine with beef/crispy chicken salad/spring rolls) were also very nice. The dessert & ice cream (Mango/Lime scoop) we ordered were also excellent and unique. We were all very happy and enjoyed the evening out in Zurich very much. This is a highly recommendable place!

title: Excellent choice!
text:
Located in a lively (still quiet) about 10 minutes away by foot from the Acropolis museum and the nearest metro station Sygrou-Fix, this B&B is a true hidden gem. We were a family of 4 (2 teenagers) and loved our stay (3 nights) very much: nice, safe, quiet location, very clean rooms (2nd floor, stairs only) nice AC, nice bathroom, good WiFi, refrigerator in the room (free water) free choice of a breakfast menu (very yummy menus to choose from including a coffee and a freshly squeezed orange juice), nice and relaxed hosts and excellent cleaning ladies (they did a superb job with an eye on details).
If your looking for a nice and affordable place to stay close to Acropolis, come here. You won’t regret it.

title: Excellent - everything from A-Z!
text: All meals we ordered (family with two teenagers) were excellent and of a very high quality. The service was outstanding and the owner, who spent 8 years working in top notch restaurants in NYC knows his business and is fun to talk to. While eating our yummy food, he even went the extra mile and went to buy a toothbrush for our daughter that she forgot to pack. What an unforgettable dinner to remember!

title: A must visit place
text:
Luckily, due to the issues related to COVID-19, not very many tourists were visiting this historic place. This made our visit very nice, agreeable and relaxed. The view overlooking the Greek capital with 5 Million inhabitants was stunning. I guess, the Parthenon is always under construction.
Being a Swiss Family with two teenagers, I felt a bit insulted and annoyed that I had to pay an entrance fee of Euro 10 for each whereas teenagers from the EU are for free to enter (up to the age of 25).

title: Excellent Falafels
text: This a very small but excellent place for a quick bite to eat if you are not looking for a fancy restaurant. Their food is fresh and of very high quality. They do not offer very much but what they offer is yummy and affordable. They also offer beer and sodas. Can only recommend this place that is about about 10 Minutes away by foot from the Acropolis museum.

title: What a positive surprise
text:
My wife and I (Swiss and around 50 years of age) had a very nice dinner at this kind of hidden restaurant. For 60 Euro, including a tip, we both had some yummy garlic bread as a starter, then a good beef fillet, French fries, a on the side Mixed Salat, a Beer, a Glass of nice red wine, water, two delicious desserts (chocolate mousse & a crepe with grand marnier/vanilla ice cream) and a coffee. Everything was totally fine (except the nice pieces of meat were a bit over cooked)
Can highly recommend this place; you won’t be disappointed! Give it a try!
place: O Chefe Steakhouse and Sea Basket

title: Very good place for the price you pay for
text:
I can highly recommend this hotel to anyone who doesn’t need the luxury of a 5 star hotel but has certain expectations that need to be met while being on a holiday. This hotel offers a nice breakfast buffet (including Nespresso Coffee tabs), a rooftop bar with a nice view, free on site parking and is conveniently located approximately 30. minutes by foot from Funchal. Lot’s of restaurants are nearby and walking along the shoreline is wonderful.
The only negatives I can mention are the small bathroom and the not so comfortable bed.

title: I had higher expectations
text: Stayed at many different Scandic hotel (in Vaasa last night) and must say that the price I paid for my room did not meet my expectations. Booked a room with a queen bed, got one with two single/small beds. Bathroom did not look very inviting and the shower with a curtain was outdated. Will stay at another place if ever visiting Vantaa again.

title: Not really a good (tasty) pizza
text: I read a lot of about that pizzas in Finland are not really good. I can only agree with that saying as the tuna pizza that I ordered was not really good. Very blend, not really tasty... just a below average pizza in comparison with any pizza you order in Italy. They also had no spicy oil to offer. Can’t really recommend this place...

title: A must place to visit
text: A fun elevator ride takes you up to the 67th floor in less than a minute. Once arrived at the top, the view from the 70th floor is breathtaking and wonderful. Enjoy and hope not to wait in line too long!

title: Good value but not more
text:
Don’t know if they a really set up to cater to tourists. At check in we were told that breakfast would be from 06:30-09:30 on weekdays. Today, we showed up at 09:10 and very much too our surprise breakfast was already closed. Firstly, closing at 9am seems to me unusually early (especially for a place like this one!) and secondly, the unfriendly attitude of most people just doesn’t make things any better.
The room itself was large, nice and clean.

title: Nice place worth visiting
text: Spent one night at this lovely place while visiting a nearby customer. Also had a nice dinner consisting of three courses. You’re able to choose one out of three appetizers, main courses and desserts. The three courses I choose were all good and the set price was € 29.90, drinks not included. The red wine was excellent, especially considering the price of €3.90 for a 1,2 dl glass. The room/bathroom was also nice, spacious, well equipped and quiet. Can definitely recommend this place!

title: A nice way to see the famous sights from the water
text: Book this 2 hours tour and you won’t regret it. We had a good while being on this special sailing boat.
place: Lisbon Traditional Boats - Guided Sightseeing Cruise

title: Good way to start your stay in Lisbon
text: All worked out well from the booking, meeting up and walking around in interesting and diverse Lisbon, a capital city of approximately 2 Mio. inhabitants including its suburbs. We have nothing to complain about; just be open minded and enjoy the walk through the different parts of the city that even included a yummy pasteis de nata from a pastelleria and some tapas and a glass of wine at a local restaurant. Overall, it was a good experience.
place: Best of Lisbon Guided Walking Tour

title: Good place for a quick pizza
text: Thus rather small place has a pretty small selection of pizzas only. No pasta or other meals are offered here. Pizzas only s fee appetizers. Good service and good value what you pay for.

title: Nice boutique hotel - great location
text: Great hotel to spend a few nights in vibrant Tel Aviv. We stayed in a room facing the main street in which we could hear the music from nearby places quite good. Would recommend not to stay in one of the street facing rooms unless you plan to go to bed not early...

title: Good place for a good piece of meat
text: Despite having higher expectations, we still had a good night out. The service was friendly, the variety of beers (national and international) was nice, the „ceasar salad“ I ordered was good eventhough it was after all not really a true ceasar salad (iceberg lettuce and no romaine, chicoree?, french dressing, beacon strips laid on top of the salad, slivers of parmesan,... We all ordered a Swiss Steak/Entrecôte, the meat was good and lean; it could have had a little bit more taste and one of my friends Steak was cooked too long. We did not care for the sauces very much. The wine was good. Overall, a good place but the price-performance ratio has room for an improvement. Check it out yourself to see how much you like it.

title: Mixed Opinion
text:
We were a group of 8 and our opinions varied quite a bit. Some were pleased with what they ordered while others were disappointed.
Since we were celebrating our National Day, we treated ourselves with a cocktail. They were good, especially the Strawberry Daiquiri, but they could have used more alcohol and less syrup.
The quiche with a small salad (N$ 45) was very good and in comparison with some other dishes a bargain. A chef's salad costs N$ 85; that salad is pretty small and includes low quality ingredients, such as iceberg salad. The garden salad next door at the "Brewery" costs the same and is ten times better. The risotto and the chicken Schnitzel were okay. The service was friendly and good. However, we were almost the only ones in the restaurant; the kitchen closes at 21:00. If we had the choice, we would prefer Brewer&Butcher or the Village Cafe.

title: A nice place - you won't be disappointed
text: Nice location, cool atmosphere, good food (Appetizers, Starters and main courses) and a good variety, very nice own brewed beers, good service but may be a little bit on the slow side, nice and clean toilets, ... and reasonable prices (for instance, below €10 for a delicious burger with yummy french fries. We were a party of 8 and all of us loved it being there. Check it out yourself, you won't be disappointed!

title: What a great place on earth!
text: We spent two nights at this lovely place with very nice hosts, a great terrace with a superb view over the bush land and mountains in the back, nice bungalows equipment with all the necessary amenities you need, a cozy dining room where local and good food is being served and much more. I can highly recommend this place to spend a couple of relaxing days!

title: Not worth visiting again!
text: The atmosphere was pretty cool but nothing else was. The food (chicken fajita) I ordered was served immediately; I mean, literally within one minute after I pleced the order! The portion of chicken was huge, the pieces were also big (not meant to put inside a tortilla) not appealing, not very warm and just not good at all. In general, the service was not good, waitress could not speak german well and a tip of 10% was added automatically on the bill. I certainly will not return to this place!

title: Good hotel for a short stay
text: While being on business in the area of the airport of Madrid, I was recommended by a local work colleague to spend the one night here. It was a good choice: friendly, but not very fast check-in, large and quite rooms, comfortable beds, good and large breakfast buffet. Overall, good value for what you get. Be informed that it takes about 40 Min. by metro to the centre of Madrid!

title: Good business hotel
text: Friendly reception, fast check in and out, breakfast was okay (room for improvement), large and quite rooms, comfortable king size bed, bathroom needs to be renovated and windows can't be opened. Overall, if you need to stay in the area of Berchem for a couple of days, I can recommend this hotel.

title: Average place
text: While being on a business trip, a rather large group of around 15 people had dinner at this restaurant. The food served was just average, the meat was cooked too long and the french fried could have been warmer. The service was rather inattentive and unorganized. Having eaten at this restaurant won't stay long in my memory.

title: Good food but slow service
text:
As a business group of 12, we had dinner at the place. The place is cozy, nicely decorated and somewhat special. Positive: food, atmosphere, location
Negative: slow and inattentive service, despite the good and nicely presented dishes, the prices are rather steep.

title: Nice place with good food at reasonable prices
text: Nice location in old town of Alghero. The service was good and so was the food. We ate three portions of "porchetta" for which this restaurant seems to be well known. We did not get disappionted. Overall, we all enjoyed being here!
place: Trattoria Lo Romani - Da Vittoria e Gigi

title: Mediocre dining with a great viee
text: You get preferred seating if you make a reservation. We arrived at 7:30 pm and got our food served rather quickly. The meals are hit or miss. The beef filet and the black noodled with octopus were very good, the shrimp cocktail and and fried mozarella left much to be desired.

title: Nice and quite place
text:
The small complex (B&B) is a little bit away from the town centre. It offers pretty much everything you need. + covered parking garage, nice room, good A/C, lovely owners, pretty good breakfast, nice location
- no pool, no shelves in the shower, no toilet paper holder, not much storage space considering it's a room for four people. For us, the pluses outweighted the minuses. Also, you can't beat the price. We can recommend this place. We stayed here for three nights.

title: Okay but nothing more
text: We didn't have a reservation but were able to get a table for the four of us anyway. We got seated right away, were able to order our drinks/food rather fast and got the drinks within minutes after we placed the order. So far so good. However, the longer we were there the sloppier the service got. The mixed salad I ordered was good, but the pizzas we got could have been much better. They had no taste, the doughs were blend and there was hardly any sauce on them. After the tiramisu we ate, we had to wait a great until we got the bill. They prices were affordable (€7 for a pizza) and we also did get charged a "copperto" but concidering the quality of the food I have my doubts that I will ever return to this restaurant.

title: What a fun place to visit
text: Come here with your teenagers! The view, the rocks and the bolders and the crystal clear water make this place a must see while being in the area. We were an international group of 18 in total and we all had a superb time.

title: What a fun place to visit
text: Come here with your teenagers; they're gonna love it jumping and walking from one rock to another. It could also get a little bit challenging glimbing on all the bolders. Check it out and enjoy!

title: We enjoyed it!
text: We were an international group of 18 in total (adults and teenagers) and we all had a good time while being here. There is so much to see and do. Come here and enjoy the special atmosphere.

title: Always worth a visit
text: This lovely and picturesque village is always nice to visit. Finding a nearby parking space might be at certain times very difficult and nerve wracking! Check it out-you won't be disappointed.

title: Not a must visit but also not a waste of your time
text: Not far away from the beautiful casino you will find the harbor with many nice and luxurious boats. You'll find all sizes. Walk back to the casino along the shore (by the Monte Carlo Yacht Club) and enjoy watching the activities in the harbor.

title: Upper scale and quite restaurant
text: This lovely restaurant is very close to the main piazza. Seating possibilities outside, nice and diverse menu, good food and an afforable and tasty house wine. I can certainly recommend this place; go check it out☺!

title: Nice hotel with very good food
text: This hotel is a little bit away from the main town activities. In brief, there is really not much to complain about besides the beds being hard and the water in the bathroom sink not draining easily. I can only highly recommend this place and make sure to book half board.

title: Unique little restaurant in a picturesque surroundings
text: On a sunny day, we started our walk along the river Sihl in Sihlbrugg and it took us about 80 min. to the restaurant Sihlmatt. The walk was very nice and easy. The menu at the Restaurant is rather small but of good quality. Their speciality are trouts and their white wine selections are also good. Check it out on a nice day and make a reservation to seat outsinde on the Patio. The service could have been friendlier.

title: Average food and serviceny
text: The food was just okey and the wine list was small and of of low quality. I would not really recommend this place in this area of town. Other places were so busy that we could not get a table right away. Since we did not want to wait any longer we ended up eating here. It was not the smartest joice.

title: Service good but steak/fillet overcooked
text: The steak (fillet) , ordered medium, came well done. That was a big disappointment. All in all, I spent around Euro 45 for a 250gr fillet, some french fries, a salad and a large beer. For what I received, it was too much. Won't come back to this place.

title: This little pizza place is as good as its rating
text: During a short lunch break, I had a pizza tonna. It was very good. Only cash is accepted, no cards. I can highly recommend this pizzeria. Check it out yourself. You won't be disappointed!

title: Very nice business hotel
text: This hotel is conveniently located to the airport. The reception area is large and nicely devorated. The preparation for the check in took place during the drive from the airport to the hotel in a Radisson Blu car. Very convenient! The room and the bed were large, the buffet was okay and the wifi worked very well, Overall, I can only highly recommend everyone, but especially business traveller to stay at this very nice hotel!

title: Nice hotel but noisy outside until late
text: Nice room with a nice separate bathroom. Good restaurant with a good and tasty variety of buffet dishes. I can only recommend this hotel; but the loud noise (music) from outside disturbed my falling asleep a lot. My room was facing the main street!

title: Disappointing
text: After having read the reviews, we expected more: the food was just okay (cold), the sevice was slow and the prices were rather high for the quality of the dishes served. Can't really recommend this place!

title: Fun walk along the windy shore
text: During our walk along the beach to the most northern point of continental europe, we almost got blown away by the strong (and sandy!!) wind. We had a good time though!

title: Watching a soccer game at Bronby Stadium
text: Even though the scoreless game was boring (qualifying game for the european ligue against Omonia Nicosia from Cypress) I had a good time with my teenage son. The two tickets cost only DKK 150 and parking on the streets was free.

title: Very nice and special Auberge
text: This is s cool place to spend one or even a few nights at while being away on a business trip: the rooms are all differently decorated and big, the breakfast buffet is very nice, parking and wifi are for free and the restaurant provides upper class food and wines. Highly recommendable!
